vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀνθρωπ-άρεσκος [ᾰρ], ὁ,
man-pleaser, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: one who wins favor, who pleases people
vocabInfos.mediumDef: desirous of pleasing men, one who wins favor Eph. 6:6; Col. 3:22*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: alguien que actúa para complacer a los hombres
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 專研討人歡心的, 向人獻殷勤的 (弗 6:6; 西 3:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 专研讨人欢心的, 向人献殷勤的 (弗 6:6; 西 3:22)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để làm vừa lòng người; mong muốn làm hài lòng đàn ông
vocabInfos._es_Gloss: persona que quiere agradar a los demás
